QuestData.Title: Fetching Wrex
QuestData.Description:
When all the commotion started, Ancel's pup ran off. The poor thing was terrified!
A couple farmhands went to look for him, but with all of these monsters terrorizing the farm, I fear the worst!
Can you keep an eye out for Wrex while you're up in the hills? He might have gotten trapped in the honey too.
QuestData.LogDescription: Crack open Crystallized Honey to search for Wrex.
QuestData.RewardText: Ancel will be happy to know that Wrex is safe and sound!
